name: nutify
description: Nutify is a lightweight alert and activity push notification tool for local networks. It supports HTTP-based triggers and offers a minimal web-based UI for confirming, snoozing, or tracking alerts.
features: HTTP-based alerts: Trigger notifications by sending HTTP requests to the server.
Web interface: View, manage, and respond to alerts through a browser-based UI.
Alert confirmation: Mark alerts as acknowledged or resolved to track response status.
Snooze functionality: Temporarily dismiss alerts with automatic re-notification after delay.
Activity tracking: Log all alerts and actions for audit trails and analysis.
Local network focus: Designed for internal networks without external dependencies.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource usage suitable for edge devices or small servers.
Custom triggers: Integrate with scripts, monitoring tools, or automation systems.
Alert history: Review past notifications and response times for troubleshooting.
Simple API: Easy integration with existing systems using straightforward HTTP endpoints.
No authentication required: Optional security for trusted local network environments.
Quick deployment: Simple setup with minimal configuration for rapid implementation.
